jobpost:
1010data travels at the speed of thought to make Big Data discovery easy; we power sub second responses to analyses run on billions of rows of data.
An essential tool to more than 750 of the world’s top retail, manufacturing, telecom, government and financial services enterprises including The New York Stock Exchange, Dollar General, P&G, and RiteAid; 1010data is a highly differentiated product that is becoming the industry standard for Big Data Discovery and Data Sharing.
We are seeking a Systems Security Engineer to establish and implement measures to protect the privacy of our customer data and intellectual property.
With more than 25 trillion rows of data in our private cloud, 1010data is designed to scale to the largest volumes of granular data, the most disparate and varied data sets, and the most complex advanced analytics. All while delivering lightning-quick system performance. 
The right person appreciates the end-end ownership of building tools and is confident in embracing new technologies that come with cutting edge security.
If you are a software engineer/developer with a systems security background, excited to employ cutting edge techniques to manage and secure massive amounts of data in dynamic web environments, we would like to speak with you!
Responsibilities:

Designing, building & managing new security infrastructure
Continuing enhancement and maintenance of existing security logs, investigating incidents and reviewing code
Security tool evaluation
Incident response and investigation
Mining security data, performing deep analysis to discover unrealized threats, in order to provide better transparency and more accurate metrics
Implementing identity and key management infrastructure
Work collaboratively with developers as well as non-technical business units
Some after hours and on-call work as required

Requirements: Education & Experience

Solid background/experience in enterprise level system security and analysis 
Experience with any two of following solution technologies:- Endpoint protections; including AV, Anti-malware- Patch management (Windows, Mac, Linux)- Vulnerability scanning; infra & web (Nmap, OpenVAS, PBNJ & others)- Configuration management- Web traffic filtering (OpenDNS)- Password vaulting solutions- Full disk encryption (FDE) solutions (Win, Mac, Linux)- Bring Your Own Device (BYOD) solutions
SIEM familiarity (highly desirable)

Skills

Interfacing and deployment of directory services (i.e. Active Directory, or LDAP)
Strong understanding of cryptography algorithms
Understanding of parallel and distributed systems, and multi-tier web applications

Communication

Communicate clearly and have strong, positive interpersonal skills
Have the ability to articulate in his/her ideas, consider options presented by others and reach an informed, balanced technical opinion
Demonstrate the ability to review the technical documentation provided by others and provide constructive comments

__________________________________________________
Though we try our best to respond to everyone, sometimes due to the volume of applications received, only those selected for interviews will be contacted. If you really think we’ve missed the mark, please follow up to recruiting@1010data.com and let us know why you’re the perfect fit!
